Betweeness Centrality, a basic way to measure "influence":

```python
# use karate club network
# G_kc = nx.karate_club_graph()

In [8]: betweeness = nx.betweenness_centrality(G_kc)

In [9]: betweeness
Out[9]: 
{0: 0.4376352813852815,
```
